item.title: Rachel wrote a quiz
item.description: Rachel wrote a quiz for her family. It has 50 questions, split into 10 subjects: General Knowledge; Logos; Film and TV; Food and Drink; Country Shapes; Science and Nature; Childrenâ€™s TV; Sport; Music and ‘2020’. To make it accessible and easy to interpret it is built as a slideshow using LiberOffice Impress. The first 50 slides present the questions and the remaining 50 present the question followed by the answer.

item.title: About
item.description: Me IT / network / infosec supergeek. Based in UK. Email me: www@leefuller.io This Site Written in markdown, html generated by Hugo, served by Apache and powered by Debian GNU/Linux.

item.title: Welcome to my site
item.description: Archive.org last crawled my old site on December 27 2018. I was tired of maintaining a basic personal site using WordPress since Gutenberg came along. After nearly 2 years of downtime, here it is. This time built with Hugo.
